title: Anatomical Heart Model
description: A life-size anatomical heart for surgical planning.
details: Used for pre-surgical planning at XYZ Hospital. Enabled surgeons to visualize complex anatomy and plan procedures more effectively. The model was printed using high-resolution FDM technology with biocompatible PLA material.

title: Bionic Prosthetic Arm
description: Custom-fitted bionic arm with myoelectric sensors.
details: A fully functional prosthetic arm designed for a patient with transradial amputation. Features lightweight lattice structure for breathability and integrated mounting points for myoelectric sensors.

title: V8 Engine Prototype
description: 1:4 scale functional V8 engine block for design validation.
details: Rapid prototyping of a V8 engine block to validate cooling channels and assembly tolerances. Printed in Nylon 12 using SLS technology for high durability and thermal resistance.
